sentences.en: As we cannot produce enough thermoelectricity, we should try to generate more hydroelectricity.
sentences.cn: 火电上不去, 要在水电上打主意.

sentences.en: Hydroelectricity is one of the cleanest and most reliable sources of renewable energy.
sentences.cn: 水电是可再生资源中最清洁、最可靠的能源之一.

sentences.en: It had some effect for hydroelectricity taking part in electricity market in foreign countries.
sentences.cn: 随着我国市场化的推进,水电正酝酿逐步参与到电力市场化运营中去.

sentences.en: Large content hydroelectricity set should use AC - AC frequency converter.
sentences.cn: 大容量水电机组宜采用交 - 交变频器.

sentences.en: Of the total energy needed by the nation today , hydroelectricity has contributed 20 % upwards.
sentences.cn: 并通过开发水电,解决了当前五分之一以上的能源需求.

sentences.en: SHEN Zu - yi . Hydro Turbine Regulation. Beijing: Hydraulic and Hydroelectricity Press, 1998.
sentences.cn: 沈祖诒. 水轮机调节. 北京: 水利水电出版社, 1998.

sentences.en: The church is now an ominous symbol of energy shortages in the country, which gets around 68 percent of its power from hydroelectricity, Reuters reported.
sentences.cn: 据路透社报道，这座教堂现在成为象征国家能源短缺的不祥之物，在这个国家，约有68%的电力来自于水力发电。

sentences.en: The potential of hydroelectricity of one region varies from that of another.
The sharp increase of water flow to ramp up hydroelectricity caused severe stress to the nation's largest lake, Lake Sevan, where efforts at ecological restoration are a continuing battle.
sentences.cn: 水流量迅猛增加，以加速水力发电，这给这个国家最大的湖泊斯旺湖造成了严重的压力，生态恢复仍旧是一场持久战。

sentences.en: Toppling - sliding is a serious problem in mining and hydroelectricity construction.
sentences.cn: 在矿山开发、水电建设过程中倾倒变形问题日渐突出.

words.tran_cn: 水力发电的；水电治疗的

trans.tran_en: Hydroelectricity is electricity made from the energy of running water
